title: The Migrant experience. Parts 1 and 2 (Captioned)
creator_credit: Malcolm Smith, Film Australia, Australian Institute of Multicultural Affairs, Karl McPhee and Ben Lewin
brief_description: From a series of six episodes that presents a comprehensive history of the role of migration in the development of Australia. Part 1 “Setting out” looks at the general history of migration to Australia over the past 200 years. Part 2 “Of dreams and reasons” looks at the reasons why people left their homelands and came to Australia.
